Name: Mines & Dragons
About the game: Mines & Dragons is a hexagonal minesweeper-strategy-roguelike game where you need to be wise and choose the right power-ups to travel through Fortuna Land and get your big treasure. FEATURES: A very original game. Hexagonal Minesweeper. 3 characters to play. Different paths. Different weapons. A real intelligence test.
